00041 
00042 #ifndef __LIBCFS_HASH_H__
00043 #define __LIBCFS_HASH_H__
00044 
00045 #include <linux/hash.h>
00046 
00047 /*
00048  * Knuth recommends primes in approximately golden ratio to the maximum
00049  * integer representable by a machine word for multiplicative hashing.
00050  * Chuck Lever verified the effectiveness of this technique:
00051  * http://www.citi.umich.edu/techreports/reports/citi-tr-00-1.pdf
00052  *
00053  * These primes are chosen to be bit-sparse, that is operations on
00054  * them can use shifts and additions instead of multiplications for
00055  * machines where multiplications are slow.
00056  */
00057 /* 2^31 + 2^29 - 2^25 + 2^22 - 2^19 - 2^16 + 1 */
00058 #define CFS_GOLDEN_RATIO_PRIME_32 0x9e370001UL
00059 /*  2^63 + 2^61 - 2^57 + 2^54 - 2^51 - 2^18 + 1 */
00060 #define CFS_GOLDEN_RATIO_PRIME_64 0x9e37fffffffc0001ULL
00061 
00063 #define CFS_HASH_DEBUG_NONE     0
00064 
00066 #define CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1        1
00067 
00068 #define CFS_HASH_DEBUG_2        2
00069 
00070 #define CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL    CFS_HASH_DEBUG_NONE
00071 
00072 struct cfs_hash_ops;
00073 struct cfs_hash_lock_ops;
00074 struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops;
00075 
00076 union cfs_hash_lock {
00077         rwlock_t                rw;             
00078         spinlock_t              spin;           
00079 };
00080 
00092 struct cfs_hash_bucket {
00093         union cfs_hash_lock     hsb_lock;       
00094         __u32                   hsb_count;      
00095         __u32                   hsb_version;    
00096         unsigned int            hsb_index;      
00097         int                     hsb_depmax;     
00098         long                    hsb_head[0];    
00099 };
00100 
00104 struct cfs_hash_bd {
00106         struct cfs_hash_bucket  *bd_bucket;
00108         unsigned int             bd_offset;
00109 };
00110 
00111 #define CFS_HASH_NAME_LEN           16      
00112 #define CFS_HASH_BIGNAME_LEN        64      
00114 #define CFS_HASH_BKT_BITS           3       
00115 #define CFS_HASH_BITS_MAX           30      
00116 #define CFS_HASH_BITS_MIN           CFS_HASH_BKT_BITS
00117 
00121 enum cfs_hash_tag {
00130         CFS_HASH_NO_LOCK        = 1 << 0,
00132         CFS_HASH_NO_BKTLOCK     = 1 << 1,
00134         CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK     = 1 << 2,
00136         CFS_HASH_SPIN_BKTLOCK   = 1 << 3,
00138         CFS_HASH_ADD_TAIL       = 1 << 4,
00140         CFS_HASH_NO_ITEMREF     = 1 << 5,
00142         CFS_HASH_BIGNAME        = 1 << 6,
00144         CFS_HASH_COUNTER        = 1 << 7,
00146         CFS_HASH_REHASH_KEY     = 1 << 8,
00148         CFS_HASH_REHASH         = 1 << 9,
00150         CFS_HASH_SHRINK         = 1 << 10,
00152         CFS_HASH_ASSERT_EMPTY   = 1 << 11,
00154         CFS_HASH_DEPTH          = 1 << 12,
00159         CFS_HASH_NBLK_CHANGE    = 1 << 13,
00162 };
00163 
00165 #define CFS_HASH_DEFAULT       (CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK | \
00166                                 CFS_HASH_COUNTER | CFS_HASH_REHASH)
00167 
00207 struct cfs_hash {
00210         union cfs_hash_lock             hs_lock;
00212         struct cfs_hash_ops             *hs_ops;
00214         struct cfs_hash_lock_ops        *hs_lops;
00216         struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops       *hs_hops;
00218         struct cfs_hash_bucket          **hs_buckets;
00220         atomic_t                        hs_count;
00222         __u16                       hs_flags;
00224         __u16                       hs_extra_bytes;
00226         __u8                        hs_iterating;
00228         __u8                        hs_exiting;
00230         __u8                        hs_cur_bits;
00232         __u8                        hs_min_bits;
00234         __u8                        hs_max_bits;
00236         __u8                        hs_rehash_bits;
00238         __u8                        hs_bkt_bits;
00240         __u16                       hs_min_theta;
00242         __u16                       hs_max_theta;
00244         __u32                       hs_rehash_count;
00246         __u32                       hs_iterators;
00248         struct cfs_workitem             hs_rehash_wi;
00250         atomic_t                        hs_refcount;
00252         struct cfs_hash_bucket          **hs_rehash_buckets;
00253 #if CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL >= CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1
00254 
00255         spinlock_t                  hs_dep_lock;
00257         unsigned int                hs_dep_max;
00259         unsigned int                hs_dep_bkt;
00261         unsigned int                hs_dep_off;
00263         unsigned int                hs_dep_bits;
00265         struct cfs_workitem         hs_dep_wi;
00266 #endif
00267 
00268         char                        hs_name[0];
00269 };
00270 
00271 struct cfs_hash_lock_ops {
00273         void    (*hs_lock)(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive);
00275         void    (*hs_unlock)(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive);
00277         void    (*hs_bkt_lock)(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive);
00279         void    (*hs_bkt_unlock)(union cfs_hash_lock *lock, int exclusive);
00280 };
00281 
00282 struct cfs_hash_hlist_ops {
00284         struct hlist_head *(*hop_hhead)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd);
00286         int (*hop_hhead_size)(struct cfs_hash *hs);
00288         int (*hop_hnode_add)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00289                                 struct hlist_node *hnode);
00291         int (*hop_hnode_del)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00292                                 struct hlist_node *hnode);
00293 };
00294 
00295 struct cfs_hash_ops {
00297         unsigned (*hs_hash)(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, unsigned mask);
00299         void *   (*hs_key)(struct hlist_node *hnode);
00301         void     (*hs_keycpy)(struct hlist_node *hnode, void *key);
00306         int      (*hs_keycmp)(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00308         void *   (*hs_object)(struct hlist_node *hnode);
00310         void     (*hs_get)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00312         void     (*hs_put)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00314         void     (*hs_put_locked)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00316         void     (*hs_exit)(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00317 };
00318 
00320 #define CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs)       \
00321         (1U << ((hs)->hs_cur_bits - (hs)->hs_bkt_bits))
00322 
00324 #define CFS_HASH_RH_NBKT(hs)    \
00325         (1U << ((hs)->hs_rehash_bits - (hs)->hs_bkt_bits))
00326 
00328 #define CFS_HASH_BKT_NHLIST(hs) (1U << (hs)->hs_bkt_bits)
00329 
00331 #define CFS_HASH_NHLIST(hs)     (1U << (hs)->hs_cur_bits)
00332 
00334 #define CFS_HASH_RH_NHLIST(hs)  (1U << (hs)->hs_rehash_bits)
00335 
00336 static inline int
00337 cfs_hash_with_no_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00338 {
00339         /* caller will serialize all operations for this hash-table */
00340         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_NO_LOCK) != 0;
00341 }
00342 
00343 static inline int
00344 cfs_hash_with_no_bktlock(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00345 {
00346         /* no bucket lock, one single lock to protect the hash-table */
00347         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_NO_BKTLOCK) != 0;
00348 }
00349 
00350 static inline int
00351 cfs_hash_with_rw_bktlock(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00352 {
00353         /* rwlock to protect hash bucket */
00354         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_RW_BKTLOCK) != 0;
00355 }
00356 
00357 static inline int
00358 cfs_hash_with_spin_bktlock(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00359 {
00360         /* spinlock to protect hash bucket */
00361         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_SPIN_BKTLOCK) != 0;
00362 }
00363 
00364 static inline int
00365 cfs_hash_with_add_tail(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00366 {
00367         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_ADD_TAIL) != 0;
00368 }
00369 
00370 static inline int
00371 cfs_hash_with_no_itemref(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00372 {
00373         /* hash-table doesn't keep refcount on item,
00374          * item can't be removed from hash unless it's
00375          * ZERO refcount */
00376         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_NO_ITEMREF) != 0;
00377 }
00378 
00379 static inline int
00380 cfs_hash_with_bigname(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00381 {
00382         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_BIGNAME) != 0;
00383 }
00384 
00385 static inline int
00386 cfs_hash_with_counter(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00387 {
00388         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_COUNTER) != 0;
00389 }
00390 
00391 static inline int
00392 cfs_hash_with_rehash(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00393 {
00394         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH) != 0;
00395 }
00396 
00397 static inline int
00398 cfs_hash_with_rehash_key(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00399 {
00400         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_REHASH_KEY) != 0;
00401 }
00402 
00403 static inline int
00404 cfs_hash_with_shrink(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00405 {
00406         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_SHRINK) != 0;
00407 }
00408 
00409 static inline int
00410 cfs_hash_with_assert_empty(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00411 {
00412         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_ASSERT_EMPTY) != 0;
00413 }
00414 
00415 static inline int
00416 cfs_hash_with_depth(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00417 {
00418         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_DEPTH) != 0;
00419 }
00420 
00421 static inline int
00422 cfs_hash_with_nblk_change(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00423 {
00424         return (hs->hs_flags & CFS_HASH_NBLK_CHANGE) != 0;
00425 }
00426 
00427 static inline int
00428 cfs_hash_is_exiting(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00429 {       /* cfs_hash_destroy is called */
00430         return hs->hs_exiting;
00431 }
00432 
00433 static inline int
00434 cfs_hash_is_rehashing(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00435 {       /* rehash is launched */
00436         return hs->hs_rehash_bits != 0;
00437 }
00438 
00439 static inline int
00440 cfs_hash_is_iterating(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00441 {       /* someone is calling cfs_hash_for_each_* */
00442         return hs->hs_iterating || hs->hs_iterators != 0;
00443 }
00444 
00445 static inline int
00446 cfs_hash_bkt_size(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00447 {
00448         return offsetof(struct cfs_hash_bucket, hsb_head[0]) +
00449                hs->hs_hops->hop_hhead_size(hs) * CFS_HASH_BKT_NHLIST(hs) +
00450                hs->hs_extra_bytes;
00451 }
00452 
00453 static inline unsigned
00454 cfs_hash_id(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, unsigned mask)
00455 {
00456         return hs->hs_ops->hs_hash(hs, key, mask);
00457 }
00458 
00459 static inline void *
00460 cfs_hash_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00461 {
00462         return hs->hs_ops->hs_key(hnode);
00463 }
00464 
00465 static inline void
00466 cfs_hash_keycpy(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode, void *key)
00467 {
00468         if (hs->hs_ops->hs_keycpy != NULL)
00469                 hs->hs_ops->hs_keycpy(hnode, key);
00470 }
00471 
00475 static inline int
00476 cfs_hash_keycmp(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00477 {
00478         return hs->hs_ops->hs_keycmp(key, hnode);
00479 }
00480 
00481 static inline void *
00482 cfs_hash_object(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00483 {
00484         return hs->hs_ops->hs_object(hnode);
00485 }
00486 
00487 static inline void
00488 cfs_hash_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00489 {
00490         return hs->hs_ops->hs_get(hs, hnode);
00491 }
00492 
00493 static inline void
00494 cfs_hash_put_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00495 {
00496         return hs->hs_ops->hs_put_locked(hs, hnode);
00497 }
00498 
00499 static inline void
00500 cfs_hash_put(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00501 {
00502         return hs->hs_ops->hs_put(hs, hnode);
00503 }
00504 
00505 static inline void
00506 cfs_hash_exit(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00507 {
00508         if (hs->hs_ops->hs_exit)
00509                 hs->hs_ops->hs_exit(hs, hnode);
00510 }
00511 
00512 static inline void cfs_hash_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, int excl)
00513 {
00514         hs->hs_lops->hs_lock(&hs->hs_lock, excl);
00515 }
00516 
00517 static inline void cfs_hash_unlock(struct cfs_hash *hs, int excl)
00518 {
00519         hs->hs_lops->hs_unlock(&hs->hs_lock, excl);
00520 }
00521 
00522 static inline int cfs_hash_dec_and_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00523                                         atomic_t *condition)
00524 {
00525         LASSERT(cfs_hash_with_no_bktlock(hs));
00526         return atomic_dec_and_lock(condition, &hs->hs_lock.spin);
00527 }
00528 
00529 static inline void cfs_hash_bd_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00530                                     struct cfs_hash_bd *bd, int excl)
00531 {
00532         hs->hs_lops->hs_bkt_lock(&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_lock, excl);
00533 }
00534 
00535 static inline void cfs_hash_bd_unlock(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00536                                       struct cfs_hash_bd *bd, int excl)
00537 {
00538         hs->hs_lops->hs_bkt_unlock(&bd->bd_bucket->hsb_lock, excl);
00539 }
00540 
00545 void cfs_hash_bd_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00546                      struct cfs_hash_bd *bd);
00547 
00548 static inline void
00549 cfs_hash_bd_get_and_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00550                          struct cfs_hash_bd *bd, int excl)
00551 {
00552         cfs_hash_bd_get(hs, key, bd);
00553         cfs_hash_bd_lock(hs, bd, excl);
00554 }
00555 
00556 static inline unsigned
00557 cfs_hash_bd_index_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00558 {
00559         return bd->bd_offset | (bd->bd_bucket->hsb_index << hs->hs_bkt_bits);
00560 }
00561 
00562 static inline void
00563 cfs_hash_bd_index_set(struct cfs_hash *hs, unsigned index,
00564                       struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00565 {
00566         bd->bd_bucket = hs->hs_buckets[index >> hs->hs_bkt_bits];
00567         bd->bd_offset = index & (CFS_HASH_BKT_NHLIST(hs) - 1U);
00568 }
00569 
00570 static inline void *
00571 cfs_hash_bd_extra_get(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00572 {
00573         return (void *)bd->bd_bucket +
00574                cfs_hash_bkt_size(hs) - hs->hs_extra_bytes;
00575 }
00576 
00577 static inline __u32
00578 cfs_hash_bd_version_get(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00579 {
00580         /* need hold cfs_hash_bd_lock */
00581         return bd->bd_bucket->hsb_version;
00582 }
00583 
00584 static inline __u32
00585 cfs_hash_bd_count_get(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00586 {
00587         /* need hold cfs_hash_bd_lock */
00588         return bd->bd_bucket->hsb_count;
00589 }
00590 
00591 static inline int
00592 cfs_hash_bd_depmax_get(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00593 {
00594         return bd->bd_bucket->hsb_depmax;
00595 }
00596 
00597 static inline int
00598 cfs_hash_bd_compare(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd1, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd2)
00599 {
00600         if (bd1->bd_bucket->hsb_index != bd2->bd_bucket->hsb_index)
00601                 return bd1->bd_bucket->hsb_index - bd2->bd_bucket->hsb_index;
00602 
00603         if (bd1->bd_offset != bd2->bd_offset)
00604                 return bd1->bd_offset - bd2->bd_offset;
00605 
00606         return 0;
00607 }
00608 
00609 void cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00610                             struct hlist_node *hnode);
00611 void cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00612                             struct hlist_node *hnode);
00613 void cfs_hash_bd_move_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd_old,
00614                              struct cfs_hash_bd *bd_new,
00615                              struct hlist_node *hnode);
00616 
00617 static inline int
00618 cfs_hash_bd_dec_and_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00619                          atomic_t *condition)
00620 {
00621         LASSERT(cfs_hash_with_spin_bktlock(hs));
00622         return atomic_dec_and_lock(condition, &bd->bd_bucket->hsb_lock.spin);
00623 }
00624 
00625 static inline struct hlist_head *
00626 cfs_hash_bd_hhead(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd)
00627 {
00628         return hs->hs_hops->hop_hhead(hs, bd);
00629 }
00630

00650                           struct cfs_hash_bd *bds);
00651 void cfs_hash_dual_bd_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00652                            int excl);
00653 void cfs_hash_dual_bd_unlock(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bds,
00654                              int excl);

00656 static inline void
00657 cfs_hash_dual_bd_get_and_lock(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00658                               struct cfs_hash_bd *bds, int excl)
00659 {
00660         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get(hs, key, bds);
00661         cfs_hash_dual_bd_lock(hs, bds, excl);
00662 }

00698 /* Hash lookup/for_each functions */
00699 #define CFS_HASH_LOOP_HOG       1024
00700 
00701 typedef int (*cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t)(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00702                                       struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00703                                       struct hlist_node *node,
00704                                       void *data);
00705 void *
00706 cfs_hash_lookup(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key);
00707 void
00708 cfs_hash_for_each(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t, void *data);
00709 void
00710 cfs_hash_for_each_safe(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t, void *data);
00711 int
00712 cfs_hash_for_each_nolock(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t,
00713                          void *data, int start);
00714 int
00715 cfs_hash_for_each_empty(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t,
00716                         void *data);
00717 void
00718 cfs_hash_for_each_key(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00719                       cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t, void *data);
00720 typedef int (*cfs_hash_cond_opt_cb_t)(void *obj, void *data);
00721 void
00722 cfs_hash_cond_del(struct cfs_hash *hs, cfs_hash_cond_opt_cb_t, void *data);

00726                         cfs_hash_for_each_cb_t, void *data);

00730 /*
00731  * Rehash - Theta is calculated to be the average chained
00732  * hash depth assuming a perfectly uniform hash function.
00733  */
00734 void cfs_hash_rehash_cancel_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs);
00735 void cfs_hash_rehash_cancel(struct cfs_hash *hs);
00736 int  cfs_hash_rehash(struct cfs_hash *hs, int do_rehash);

00738                         void *new_key, struct hlist_node *hnode);
00739 
00740 #if CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL > CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1
00741 /* Validate hnode references the correct key */
00742 static inline void
00743 cfs_hash_key_validate(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00744                       struct hlist_node *hnode)
00745 {
00746         LASSERT(cfs_hash_keycmp(hs, key, hnode));
00747 }
00748 
00749 /* Validate hnode is in the correct bucket */
00750 static inline void
00751 cfs_hash_bucket_validate(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00752                         struct hlist_node *hnode)
00753 {
00754         struct cfs_hash_bd bds[2];
00755 
00756         cfs_hash_dual_bd_get(hs, cfs_hash_key(hs, hnode), bds);
00757         LASSERT(bds[0].bd_bucket == bd->bd_bucket ||
00758                 bds[1].bd_bucket == bd->bd_bucket);
00759 }
00760 
00761 #else /* CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL > CFS_HASH_DEBUG_1 */
00762 
00763 static inline void
00764 cfs_hash_key_validate(struct cfs_hash *hs, const void *key,
00765                         struct hlist_node *hnode) {}
00766 
00767 static inline void
00768 cfs_hash_bucket_validate(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00769                         struct hlist_node *hnode) {}
00770 
00771 #endif /* CFS_HASH_DEBUG_LEVEL */
00772 
00773 #define CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS  10
00774 #define CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA  (1U << (CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS - 1))
00775 #define CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA  (1U << (CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS + 1))
00776 
00777 /* Return integer component of theta */
00778 static inline int __cfs_hash_theta_int(int theta)
00779 {
00780         return (theta >> CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS);
00781 }
00782 
00783 /* Return a fractional value between 0 and 999 */
00784 static inline int __cfs_hash_theta_frac(int theta)
00785 {
00786         return ((theta * 1000) >> CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS) -
00787                (__cfs_hash_theta_int(theta) * 1000);
00788 }
00789 
00790 static inline int __cfs_hash_theta(struct cfs_hash *hs)
00791 {
00792         return (atomic_read(&hs->hs_count) <<
00793                 CFS_HASH_THETA_BITS) >> hs->hs_cur_bits;
00794 }
00795 
00796 static inline void
00797 __cfs_hash_set_theta(struct cfs_hash *hs, int min, int max)
00798 {
00799         LASSERT(min < max);
00800         hs->hs_min_theta = (__u16)min;
00801         hs->hs_max_theta = (__u16)max;
00802 }
00803 
00804 /* Generic debug formatting routines mainly for proc handler */
00805 struct seq_file;
00806 void cfs_hash_debug_header(struct seq_file *m);
00807 void cfs_hash_debug_str(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct seq_file *m);
00808 
00809 /*
00810  * Generic djb2 hash algorithm for character arrays.
00811  */
00812 static inline unsigned
00813 cfs_hash_djb2_hash(const void *key, size_t size, unsigned mask)
00814 {
00815         unsigned i, hash = 5381;
00816 
00817         LASSERT(key != NULL);
00818 
00819         for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
00820                 hash = hash * 33 + ((char *)key)[i];
00821 
00822         return (hash & mask);
00823 }
00824 
00825 /*
00826  * Generic u32 hash algorithm.
00827  */
00828 static inline unsigned
00829 cfs_hash_u32_hash(const __u32 key, unsigned mask)
00830 {
00831         return ((key * CFS_GOLDEN_RATIO_PRIME_32) & mask);
00832 }
00833 
00834 /*
00835  * Generic u64 hash algorithm.
00836  */
00837 static inline unsigned
00838 cfs_hash_u64_hash(const __u64 key, unsigned mask)
00839 {
00840         return ((unsigned)(key * CFS_GOLDEN_RATIO_PRIME_64) & mask);
00841 }
00842 
00844 #define cfs_hash_for_each_bd(bds, n, i) \
00845         for (i = 0; i < n && (bds)[i].bd_bucket != NULL; i++)
00846 
00848 #define cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(hs, bd, pos)                   \
00849         for (pos = 0;                                           \
00850              pos < CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs) &&                         \
00851              ((bd)->bd_bucket = (hs)->hs_buckets[pos]) != NULL; pos++)
00852 
00854 #define cfs_hash_bd_for_each_hlist(hs, bd, hlist)               \
00855         for ((bd)->bd_offset = 0;                               \
00856              (bd)->bd_offset < CFS_HASH_BKT_NHLIST(hs) &&       \
00857              (hlist = cfs_hash_bd_hhead(hs, bd)) != NULL;       \
00858              (bd)->bd_offset++)
00859

00861 #endif
